summary: The Django admin package implements a full-featured administrative interface for Django projects. It supplies the core site and option classes that automatically generate CRUD pages for registered models, handles model registration, URL routing, authentication, permission checks, form rendering, list filtering, bulk actions, audit logging, and provides utilities, checks, and discovery mechanisms to configure and extend the admin UI.
business_intent: To give developers a ready-to-use, customizable backend for managing application data, allowing nonâ€‘technical staff to view, edit, and audit records safely through a web interface while enforcing security and consistency.
